lead_paragraph: JACKSON--Mary French Mathes, 97, of Vero Beach, FL, died at her summer residence in York Harbor, ME on April 7, 2016. While living in Greenwich, CT, Louisville, KY and Pittsfield, MA, she was an active volunteer of strong executive ability. Beloved wife of her late husband of 63 happy years, Richard S. Jackson. Beloved mother of Richard S. Jackson, Jr., Mary French Jackson and James M. Jackson, she leaves numerous grandchildren and great- grandchildren. She was educated at the Buckley School in Great Neck, NY, the Ethel Walker School in Simsbury, CT and Vassar College, class of 1940. Funeral services will be private. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made in Mrs. Jackson's memory to Trinity Church, York Harbor, ME or the Richard S. Jackson, '39 and Mary M. Jackson Scholarship Fund at Dartmouth College, Hanover, NH. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  JACKSON, MARY FRENCH MATHES
